name: Short title
text:
ARTICLE V
GUARDIANSHIP AND PROTECTIVE PROCEEDINGS
 
Note
 
  Article heading amended by L 2004, c 161, §24.
 
Cross References
 
  Effect of L 2004, c 161 amendments, see §560:8-301.
 
PART 1.  GENERAL PROVISIONS
 
     §560:5-101  Short title.  Parts 1 through 4 of this article may be cited as the Uniform Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Act. [L 2004, c 161, pt of §1]
